    • Constructor Detail

      • TwitterLink

        public TwitterLink()
            throws TwitterException
        Constructor for a single Twitter link. Not to be used concurrently - make lots instead!
        Throws:
        TwitterException - Must perform a SINGLE STATIC LOGIN else this is thrown

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public static void login(java.lang.String AccessToken,
                         java.lang.String AccessTokenSecret,
                         java.lang.String OAuthKey,
                         java.lang.String OAuthSecret,
                         java.lang.String username)
                  throws TwitterException
        Call one to perform login and then build multiple TwitterLink objects from the single login
        Parameters:
        AccessToken - Token for application
        AccessTokenSecret - Secret for Application
        OAuthKey - Key for user
        OAuthSecret - Secret for user
        username - Name of the user
        Throws:
        TwitterException - If the login fails

      • getTrends

        public abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTrends(java.lang.String location)
                                                    throws TwitterException
        Get the trends by specifying a location.
        Parameters:
        location - A VALID location - these are specified in the location set.
        Returns:
        The trends as unparsed strings.
        Throws:
        TwitterException - It connection fails or place invalid

      • getTweets

        public abstract java.util.List<winterwell.jtwitter.Status> getTweets(java.lang.String phrase)
                                                              throws TwitterException
        Perform a search to get a page of tweets relating to a term. The Users associated with the tweet are dummies and need to be filled with the fillUser method.
        Parameters:
        phrase - The string to search with
        Returns:
        A list of JTwitter status objects (each representing a tweet) - the Users are dummies though.
        Throws:
        TwitterException - If connection fails.

      • getLocations

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getLocations()
        Use to find out the valid locations to get trends from.
        Returns:
        The set of valid locations.

      • fillUser

        public abstract void fillUser(winterwell.jtwitter.User user)
                       throws TwitterException
        Adds the actual details to a dummy user. External call so has a cost
        Parameters:
        user - User to be filled
        Throws:
        TwitterException - If connection fails.
